task_text: Give me a table of skills and their names that I don't have

text_blocks: Now I have your skills. To find all skills in the system that you don't have, I need to get the full list of all possible skills. Let me get more employee profiles to discover all available skills in the system.
I see the same 15 skills in these employees. Let me check a few more to see if there are any other skills in the system:

Looking at the data, all employees seem to have the same 15 skills. Let me check if there are any additional skills by looking at a few more employees from different departments (like R&D, IT, Production) to be thorough:

Based on my thorough analysis of multiple employees from different departments (Corporate Leadership, Sales, Production, IT, R&D, and different locations), I can now confirm that all employees in the system have the same set of 15 skills. 

Let me compare what skills exist in the system with your skills:
